title: Sem4
content: How are the linear algebra isa papers? Are they comparable to sem 2(M2) or more as to sem3(STATISTICS) ?

comments.body:
Prolly the easiest math course one can expect.
It's just playing w Matrix

Make sure to cover all the questions from QB

A good brush up on ur previous matrices knowledge initially and then introduction to a few new concepts.Overall a chill course.

MATLAB quiz could be Lil painful to accept

I don't even know the sem 4 subjects ,
U guys already thinking about the papers ðŸ™„

The only math course i enjoyed, matrix is the only thing here, just practice sums and u are golden

LAA is pretty chill, compared to SDS, M2. Follow Gilbert Strang's lectures and TB, you can nail it.
It's one of the better subjects at pes but the esa correction sucked hard
